==Lore==
The area is accessed during the {{Quest|An Eye for an Eye}}. After the Fontaine Research Institute accident, mining operations halted. The Traveler, [[Cater]], and [[Lanoire]] use the route through the mine shaft to escape Meropide and return to the surface.
